tool.name: Pretextgraph
tool.description: Embed bedgraph formatted data inside a Pretext contact map.
tool.command: cp '$pretext' input.pretext && #if $input.is_of_type("bedgraph"): cat '$input' | #else if $input.is_of_type("bigwig"): ln -s '$input' input.bigwig && bigWigToBedGraph input.bigwig /dev/stdout | #end if PretextGraph -i input.pretext #if $name: -n '$name' #end if -o output.pretext

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pretext file
param.help: Sequence names in the Pretext file must match sequence names in the bedgraph data; although relative sort order is unimportant.

tool.help: Adds additional data onto existing pretextmap files. Input Pretext file acts as a foundation for additional data to be added onto. Sequence names in the Pretext file must match sequence names in the bedgraph data; although relative sort order is unimportant. The chosen name acts as a lable on the graph.
